channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MA

item.title: Report X-2023080063
item.description:
Report X-2023080063

Identified by scraper @ 2023-08-16T06:13:42+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-07-25
  • City: WILMINGTON
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Discovered in morning. No details given to PM QA. DescribePack: The cover was not working correctly and so the can leaked out some paint. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: It was put into a red hazmat tote. No spill inside tote.

item.title: Report X-2023071007

Report X-2023071007

  • City: QUINCY
  • State: MA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package loaded in P&D vehicle incorrectly on shelf with other packages on top, causing the box to crush and one bottle to leak DescribePack: Bottle crushed and leaked DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Removed other boxes from on top of packages. Cleaned spill with neutralizer
